scripts.generate:dev-base-sepolia: npm run prepare:base-sepolia --prefix=../../packages/constants && mustache ../../node_modules/@treasure/subgraph-config/src/base-sepolia.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
scripts.generate:prod-base: npm run prepare:base --prefix=../../packages/constants && mustache ../../node_modules/@treasure/subgraph-config/src/base.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
scripts.generate:prod-abstract: npm run prepare:abstract --prefix=../../packages/constants && mustache ../../node_modules/@treasure/subgraph-config/src/abstract.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
